thread.section_title: GoDISH Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDISH | godish.com | 3 of 226
thread.title: Jan

author: Jan
title: Jan
text: After being cable-less for about a year (we left a different provider who was charging an exorbitant amount and providing such frustrating customer "service"), we took a chance on a DISH promotion. I spoke with Robert who was pleasant, informative, knowledgeable, and professional. We had our installation within 36 hours of my call. We received regular updates letting us know when our installer would arrive and, SURPRISE! he was at the house exactly on time. He got right to work and had the job done in no time. We've received timely and informative emails from the company. I am cautiously optimistic about this relationship.
